products.title: Indonesia Tropical Roman Blind
products.description: Give your room a pick-me-up with the bright and breezy indonesia tropical roman blind. Flaunting a floral motif in zesty, invigorating tones, this fully lined cotton blind exudes a distinctly fresh and tropical vibe. When raised via the sidewinder chain, this blind folds up into neat pleats and is a stylish and space saving window covering that is elegant in its simplicity. Product id: db-rom1006 fabric colour: tropical material: 100% cotton lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets.

products.title: Toucan Talk Tropical Roman Blind
products.description: These birds seem to be chatting about the latest hat trend. Colourful and fun, this fabric would look great in any bedroom or even living room. Product id: db-rom0964 fabric colour: tropical material: 100% cotton lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets. Control type: smooth chain operation - great for a durable, even finish energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - increase to er3 (high) by adding thermal lining light filtering: yes toucan talk tropical roman blind in grey/multicoloured.

products.title: Chalfont Tropical Sea Roman Blind
products.description: Cool, crisp and super stylish, this chalfont tropical sea roman blind call to mind white sands and coral-lined shallows, for that instant touch of exotic, tropical chic. The muted teal blue shade of the fabric takes the edge off its vibrant teal colour, allowing you to give you cool, crisp and super stylish, this chalfont tropical sea roman blind call to mind white sands and coral-lined shallows, for that instant touch of exotic, tropical chic.

products.title: Tropical Leaves Moss Roman Blind
products.description: This tropical leaves design by clarissa hulse is inspired by the rainforest and will help bring freshness and vitality to your surroundings. products.title: Tropical Leaves Midnight Roman Blind
products.description: A collection of tropical leaves from costa rica and the caribbean form the basis of this beautiful botanical design. Clarissa hulse is renowned for her nature-inspired stunners and this one is no exception. To highlight all the little details, this roman blind is picked out in a a collection of tropical leaves from costa rica and the caribbean form the basis of this beautiful botanical design.

products.title: Tropical Leaves Pebble Roman Blind
products.description: This tropical leaves pebble design brings to life the beauty of costa rica and the caribbean. The ornamental leafy pattern is picked out in a monochromatic palette that highlights each exotic outline. The mix of greys and neutrals is also incredibly easy to incorporate into your this tropical leaves pebble design brings to life the beauty of costa rica and the caribbean.

products.title: Toucan Talk, Tropical - Roman Blind
products.description: Featuring a lively, colourful, and charismatic array of toucans and parrots, the toucan talk tropical is nothing if not fun. The vibrant colour palette is indeed tropical, and the birds look like they could be in deep conversation. Whilst this fun and characterful blind would be ideal for a little one's bedroom or playroom, it's not exclusive to children. Adults will love the sweet illustrations too, so consider using it to breathe some life and vivacity into your kitchen or dining room.
